zap-v3.title: Zap V3 Launch
zap-v3.description: Beefy announces its largest launch campaign, collaborating with the Optimism ecosystem to highlight the capabilities of Zap V3. The 6-month campaign will reward users with $OP tokens for utilizing Zap V3 on Optimism, with monthly legs featuring dedicated reward pots based on user activity and engagement criteria. Additionally, Beefy plans various incentive programs and marketing initiatives throughout the campaign, including partner launchpool boosts on select Optimism vaults.
